title: Mother awakes to find another woman had broken into her home and was to bathe her son, 2,
text:
Elizabeth Hixon, 22, was arrested and charged with burglary after allegedly entering a home and giving a toddler a bath

A mother from Ohio has spoken about the horrifying moment she woke up to find another woman inside her home who was getting ready to give her two-year-old son a bath.

The first time she realized anything was even wrong was when she woke up to the sounds of her dog barking.

'I've never heard of anything like this,' Areica Hill said to NBC4. 'I get up and I walk to my door and the way my house is set up, I can look down the hall,' Hill explained. 'I see a white female lady, bent over the tub, with my two-year-old in the tub.'

She immediately fought the woman off and got her boyfriend to hold her in place until the cops arrived.

Elizabeth Hixon, 22, was arrested and charged with burglary. The two women do not know one another.

'Ms. Hixon stated that she entered the residence, to provide care to a juvenile, which was outside the residence,' an affidavit in the case, filed in Franklin County Municipal Court, reads.

Areica Hill woke up and found another woman inside her home, getting ready to give her two-year-old son a bath

Hixon's own mother even told the television station that her 'daughter had good intentions' and that 'her heart was in the right place.'

But such sentiments appear to cut little ice with Hill.

'I would like to see other charges filed against her,' Hill said.

Prosecutors have not yet announced what charges Hixon may face as the police investigation report has not been sent to them.

Hixon, meanwhile, has been released on bond.
description: An Ohio mother says she was horrified to discover an intruder inside her home preparing a bath for her two-year-old son. Areica Hill  woke up to find another woman in her Columbus home.
